JOB DESCRIPTION: Job Description & Skills we need in candidate for this profile:- - Strong Object Oriented development and design knowledge and experience. - In depth experience in C#.NET, WPF, MVVC based windows application development - Experience in C++/VC++ - Knowledge of design patterns and practical application of same. - Preferably knowledge on serial bus protocols such as PCIe, UFS, USB. Experience :- Total Experience 4 to 6 years in Software Development and Engineering Activities - 1 to 2-year experience in Product Development Company is mandatory.

EDUCATION.UG: BCA in Computers, B.Tech/B.E. in Computers, B.Sc in Computers
EDUCATION.PG: M.Tech in Computers, MCA in Computers, MS/M.Sc(Science) in Computers
